    • Constructor Detail

      • Person

        public Person(double age,
              int preExistingConditions,
              int xPos,
              int yPos,
              java.awt.Rectangle dimens,
              Disease disease,
              boolean asymptomatic,
              boolean isSocialDistancing,
              double antiBodyTime,
              boolean canReInfect,
              double quarantineChance)
        Creates a person object for the simBoard
        Parameters:
        age - The age of the person (affects max time sick and mortality rate)
        preExistingConditions - The number of preexisting conditions (affects mortality rate)
        xPos - The x position of the person
        yPos - They y position of the person
        dimens - The dimensions the person can be in (Rectangle obj)
        disease - The disease object the person has
        asymptomatic - Boolean value if the person can be asymptomatic when sick
        isSocialDistancing - Boolean value if the person is social distancing
        antiBodyTime - How long it takes for antibodies to expire
        canReInfect - Boolean value if the person is able to be reinfected once recovered if antibodies expire
        quarantineChance - The chance that a person will go into quarantine

      • resetDimens

        public void resetDimens(java.awt.Rectangle rect)
        Resets the person's dimension if they move to another location (ie. Quarantine)
        Parameters:
        rect - The Rectangle object that defines the dimensions

      • updateMortalityRate

        public void updateMortalityRate(int numSick,
                                int numPeople)
        Updates the current mortality rate based on the percentage of people sick in a given moment
        Parameters:
        numSick - The current number of people sick in the simulation
        numPeople - The total number of people in the simulation
